labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: It allows you as if you still had permissions
data.expected_result: It doesn't allow you to add it
data.short_description: Adding bots on 2FA-enabled servers w/out 2FA acts as if you still had admin perms
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a 2FA-enabled server without 2FA enabled (dont believe it works if you own the server) - Add a bot that suggests a permission blocked (e.g. admin)
